subject: NO UPFRONT PAYMENT UNTIL YOU RECEIVE YOUR FUND PAYMENT
body:
Sir,

RE: GOOD NEWS AS YOU WILL RECEIVE YOUR FUNDS THIS FIRST QUARTER OF THE
FISCAL YEAR 2024.

I write to inform you that your name is among the beneficiaries that
will receive their funds of US$10.5 Million (Ten Million Five Hundred
Thousand United States Dollars Only) this First quarter of the fiscal
year 2024

In view of this good news, I am pleased to inform you that your total
Payment Compensation Entitlement of US$10.5 Million has been cleared
and approved to be released to you finally through our Offshore
Payment Centers in two different countries which will be disclosed to
you as soon as you respond to my proposal.

Consequently, you are expected to travel to two countries of offshore
payment centers to sign your Original Funds Classified Document (OFCD)
to legally empower our Payment Officer to transfer your funds to you
without you paying any money upfront again till your funds get into
your bank account of your choice.

PLEASE NOTE THAT YOU ARE NOT GOING TO ADVANCE OR PAY ANY MONEY UPFRONT
TILL YOUR FUNDS GET TO YOUR BANK ACCOUNT.

Furthermore, it is very important that you send me the below
information as to enable us get your Flight Ticket and your Hotel
Accommodation:

Your Full Names.
Your Full Address.
Your Mobile Tel. No./Whatsapp Tel. No
Your Occupation.
Valid Copy of Your International Passport.
Name of Your Nearest International Airport in Your City.


Finally, if you accept to make this trip, note that the entire journey
will take you only 5 days to conclude. Therefore, you should prepare
yourself for this number of days that you will travel.

Kindly contact me on my private email address thus:
contatinfoinfo11@gmail.com Await your urgent reply.

Fred Willy

subject: Re: NO UPFRONT PAYMENT UNTIL YOU RECEIVE YOUR FUND PAYMENT
body:
Hello Fred Willy,

Thank you for reaching out with this information. I'm interested in learning more about how to proceed with receiving the funds. Could you provide me with additional details on the process of traveling to the offshore payment centers and signing the necessary documents?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Arthur

subject: what you should know
body:
Arthur

I received your respond and one of the most important procedures is
that you provide

this details as stated below.
Your Full Names.
Your Full Address.
Your Mobile Tel. No./Whats app Tel. No
Your Occupation.
Valid Copy of Your International Passport.
Name of Your Nearest International Airport in Your City.

As soon as you forward this details and it is received by me i will
put you in contact with our Protocol/. Financier who will process your
payment and the get you an air ticket to fly to our offshore payment
center where you will sign  the necessary classified document for the
final release of your fund.

However,in all the process you will pay no upfront money or make any
expenses as our Protocol/Financier will foot all the bill and fund you
for this trip,all  expenses will be taking care of this includes your
air ticket,your hotel reservation,your feeding,your transportation
while on transit,your pocket money as well as any other expenses that
will arise in the course of this trip for your payment all will be
taking care of by or protocol/financier.

Your obligation is to accept making the trip as well as comply with
every instruction as may be giving to you by our protocol
officer/financier,if you are ready then provided as stated above for
further proceedings.
Regards

Fred Willy

subject: Re: what you should know
body:
Hello Arthur, thank you for sharing this information with me. I appreciate your detailed instructions. Could you please provide more information about the purpose of this trip and how it relates to me? I'm curious to learn more about the process and how everything will be taken care of by your Protocol Financier.

Best wishes,
Arthur

subject: what you shoul know and do
body:
Dear Arthur

I want  to maker it clear to you now the way you will understand and i
believe you will this time i indeed asked you to send your details so
that before hand we will kick offs the processing of your payment by
first getting a traveling visa for you after that we wil get your
ticket ready booked on the same period as your have mention,This
reason is to save time and since you have said 2 to 4 weeks from now
you can make the trip and  if we start processing your visa and ticket
now it will allow you enough chance to get ready and prepare for the
trip.

Furthermore 2 to 4 weeks is not such a long time to waste so what i am
telling you now is to send your valid passport so that we can start
working on your trip right now when you might have contacted our
protocol/Financier who will process your ticket for this trip

Based on that i still want to remind and insisted that you forward the
below stated details of yours if actually you are fully ready to make
this trip over your fund payment and the same details as stated below.


Your Full Names.
Your Full Address.
Your Mobile Tel. No./Whatsapp Tel. No
Your Occupation.
Valid Copy of Your International Passport.
Name of Your Nearest International Airport in Your City.

I wait for your compliance to this.
Regards

Fred Willy

subject: Re: what you shoul know and do
body:
Hello Arthur,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. It sounds like an exciting opportunity to travel. Can you tell me more about the purpose of the trip and where you will be going? I'm curious to learn about the details of your upcoming adventure.

Looking forward to hearing more from you.

Best wishes,
Arthur

subject: Re: adventure.?
body:
Hello! How can I help you today?

Best wishes,
Arthur

subject: Re: STOP
body:
I'm sorry to hear that you feel that way. Can you please tell me more about why you think I'm a fool?

Best wishes,
Arthur
